Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory93.png'}

{3: 'After the crew passes through a block of buildings, a colorful large-wheeled snowmobile comes into sight. On top of it sits an unfamiliar man, dressed in thick but tattered winter clothes. Behind him is the source of the deafening music: a radio.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Biological signal detected... It's a human man.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As you converse, the man seems to have finally noticed you and begins waving.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory103.png'}
{2: '(Ask about the situation)', 3: '13'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Unfamiliar Man', 3: 'Hello, friends!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Unfamiliar Man', 3: "Ah, no no, hahahaha! I'm not lost!", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Unfamiliar Man', 3: "See this beauty? It's an antique snowmobile, Snow Leopard M958. Good for all terrains, totally swag, most popular in New Durkan in the Post-Pandemic Age. They don't manufacture this no more. The one and only in the world!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Unfamiliar Man', 3: "She's been with me much longer than some Corrupted been walkin'!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Unfamiliar Man', 3: 'Never seen ya before. First time here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Unfamiliar Man', 3: 'There\'s but one place worth seein\' here. Ya know, "that" place. That\'s where ya goin\', eh?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Unfamiliar Man', 3: "Quit bluffin'. Look at ya, all dressed like that. I know what ya do, ya ain't even need to tell me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Unfamiliar Man', 3: 'Yer "hunters", huh?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe sends you a meaningful glance and moves closer to whisper into your ear.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's what some people call them...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This used to be the biggest military research base in Cape Nohama. After the Post-Pandemic Age, all land-based airforce soldiers have fled the base.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "As for what's hidden in the base, only the soldiers and researchers who love their antifreeze and thrust-weight ratios know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Small wonder it's a popular place for treasure hunters.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Unfamiliar Man', 3: 'So? Want me ta give ya a ride? Half price for the way back too. Looks like ya come prepared. Surely ya know the importance of a guide, huh?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Thanks for the offer, but we already—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A tall, slim youth comes stumbling over, interrupting the conversation, heavy snow boots squeaking as he goes.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Don't talk to this rascal!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Panting, the youth stops in front of the group. He pushes his goggles up, revealing a scowling face. He lifts his rifle and points it at the strange man.'}
{3: "The man's face changes. Before he can retreat, Lucia stops him in his path."}
{2: "What's going on?", 3: '45'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'This old menace is a fraud!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The leader of the Forsaken comes jogging after the youth. Despite shouting at the boy in a reprimanding tone, he also raises his gun and points it at the unfamiliar man.'}
{3: 'The atmosphere turns hostile in an instant.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yamamoto', 3: 'You old cheat!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yamamoto', 3: 'Shooting him to death would be considered a mercy!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Shh, let's talk it out first.", 3: '56'}
{2: 'Yamamoto', 3: '(Hisses) Are all Babylonians nagging fools like you?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are all Forsaken all brawn and no brain like you?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Clark', 3: 'Watch your words, Yamamoto!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I understand your animosity towards Babylonia, but you\'d do well to show my "guest" some respect.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Clark', 3: "Apologies, Gray Raven Commandant, for my subordinate's impudence.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Clark', 3: 'However, do know that this guy in front of you is not trustworthy. Countless scavengers have frozen to death in the snowy plains because of him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Clark', 3: 'He has no name. Just an old riffraff that came out of nowhere.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Clark', 3: 'He\'d tell the scavengers seeking a home or passing treasure-hunters that he\'s the "Gravekeeper" of Cape Nohama.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Clark', 3: "We've saved countless hapless fools who lost all their belongings to him in this area.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gravekeeper', 3: 'Huh? Wassup with ya southerners now?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yamamoto', 3: 'Give a man an inch...!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noticing the situation getting awkward, the unfamiliar man tries to rope you into it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gravekeeper', 3: "Hey you, standin' over there! Ya really gon' just stand and watch these guys bully poor lil' me?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yamamoto', 3: "What are you talking about? Just watch, I'm gonna drag you back and show your victims—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We've got a mission to complete.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Agreed. If you guys have your local disputes to settle, we'll take our leave.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Clark', 3: 'Stop! Listen to our leader!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Clark's voice rings out. Yamamoto immediately shrinks back, mouth working as if debating whether to speak, and finally puts his gun down."}
{3: 'Watanabe falls silent for a moment.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You are certain you can give us a ride through Ghost Coast?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gravekeeper', 3: "Now why would I lie? 'Course I can, unless ya get off by yer lonesome.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Deal, then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gravekeeper', 3: 'Huh?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Give us a ride through Ghost Coast. I'll pay double.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gravekeeper', 3: 'Uh... r-really?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yes. And if it works out well, the Forsaken may consider a long-term arrangement with you.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'On one condition: no more scamming in our territory or bringing trouble to the Forsaken. I trust that the payment we can offer should be much better than what you usually get by robbing hard-up travelers.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{3: '～Living in the hustle, hanging with my fellows...～'}
{3: "～The wasteland doesn't go, gravekeepers don't say no...～"}
{3: '～Awesome! Hmm... Get some! Hmm...～'}
{3: 'Watanabe sits on the backseat of the big-wheeled snowmobile, wincing in patient exasperation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...Why are we riding with him?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's more efficient this way.", 3: '117'}
{3: 'That part is true... but you sure feel like the road is stretching on forever.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{3: 'Squeak—!'}
{3: 'The snowmobile suddenly brakes, sending everyone flying forward.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: "What's going on?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yamamoto', 3: 'Has he got something planned?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Gravekeeper turns off the music and begins shouting at us from his seat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gravekeeper', 3: "We're passin' through Ghost Coast soon. Gotta make sure the wheels ain't stuck. Ya don't wanna walk through the town for sho'.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe seems to be a bit relieved, though you're not sure if you're imagining things."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gray Raven Squad, ready up!', 3: '140'}
{3: 'Watanabe barks out orders.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Forsaken, form up!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Forsaken members leap down the vehicle in an orderly fashion and get in formation in a flash.'}
{3: 'The Gravekeeper peeks out from the window, bright blue eyes wide behind his overgrown facial hair.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gravekeeper', 3: "Uh... so... I'll be waiting for ya by the side?", 4: '1'}
